page_title: "pxc_ssh_key Data Source - pxc"

description: |-
  Fetch different ssh keys from proxmox cloud based on key type.
---

# pxc_ssh_key (Data Source)

This datasources fetches statically defined keys from proxmox / proxmox cloud.

Available key types are:

* `AUTOMATION` automation key generated in proxmox cloud setup => this key authenticates all created vms and lxcs
* `PVE_HOST_RSA` host key proxmox itself generates for authenticating and in cluster communication between the hosts

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key_type` (String) Specified key type enum

### Read-Only

- `key` (String) The raw key
